definitions.definition: WFH refers to the concept of working remotely from home, rather than commuting to an office environment.
definitions.term_usage_example: Since the pandemic, many companies have adopted WFH policies to allow their employees to work remotely.

definitions.definition: WFH se refiere al concepto de trabajar de forma remota desde casa, en lugar de trasladarse a un entorno de oficina.
definitions.term_usage_example: Desde la pandemia, muchas empresas han adoptado políticas de WFH para permitir que sus empleados trabajen de forma remota.
